sentences.en: Everybody else could grow shadowy, almost non - existent to him.
sentences.cn: 在他眼中其他人都可能变成幻影, 几乎不复存在.

sentences.en: For the moment he had forgotten the shadowy figure of Goldstein.
sentences.cn: 他一时忘记了果尔德施坦因的阴影.
煤气灯投下一片片幽暗的光.

sentences.en: He nodded, a pleased look on his shadowy face.
sentences.cn: 他点了点头, 阴影遮没的脸上出现了笑容.

sentences.en: He was the commander of a vast shadowy army.
sentences.cn: 他成了一支庞大的隐蔽的军队司令.

sentences.en: Her face was dark in this shadowy place.
sentences.cn: 她的脸在这个幽暗的地方呈浅黑色.

sentences.en: Shadowy dimness crept over the countryside.
sentences.cn: 朦胧夜色把村庄笼罩起来了.

sentences.en: Since her illness, other people had become shadowy and had no real existence for her.
sentences.cn: 自从她生病后, 其他人在她眼中变得很模糊,似乎不存在了.

sentences.en: Someone was waiting in the shadowy doorway.
sentences.cn: 有人守候在昏暗的门口。

sentences.en: The donor dads were shadowy figures, guaranteed anonymity by the clinics.
sentences.cn: 捐精者都隐姓埋名.诊所也保证不透露他们的姓名.

sentences.en: They crouched together on a shadowy hillside.
sentences.cn: 他们蹲在多荫的山坡上.

sentences.en: They went out into the still, shadowy cloister garden.
sentences.cn: 他们出了房间,走到那个寂静 、 阴沉的修道院的园子里去.

sentences.en: This proved a very vague and shadowy frontier.
sentences.cn: 其实这是一条极其含糊、极不明确的界限.

sentences.en: This shadowy path is cool and quiet.
sentences.cn: 这条多阴的小道凉爽而幽静.

sentences.en: We have been looking at the shadowy world of the paranormal.
sentences.cn: 我们一直在关注玄奇事物这一神秘世界。

words.tran_cn: 树荫；阴影；阴凉处；遮阳物；（照片等的）明暗度；少量、些微；细微的差别
暧昧；隐蔽；有阴影的情形
底纹；遮蔽；[印刷] 明暗法；[印刷] 描影法；留下阴影
阴影；影子；幽灵；庇护；隐蔽处
遮蔽（shadow的过去式及过去分词）
使阴暗；使渐变；为…遮阳；使阴郁；掩盖
朦胧的；有阴影的；虚无的；暗黑的

trans.tran_cn: 朦胧的，似影子的，模糊的，虚无的，影影绰绰
trans.tran_en: full of shadows, or difficult to see because of shadows
